snippet.title: Doom & Destiny Advanced - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now, this is the RPG all about how 
four nerds’s life got flipped-turned upside down 
and we’d like to take a minute 
just sit right there
we’ll tell you how they become the heroes of Doom & Destiny Advanced! 

Doom & Destiny Advanced is the sequel, prequel and reboot of Doom & Destiny and it's available on Steam (PC, Mac and Linux) and every mobile store!

STEAM:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/361040

GOOGLE PLAY:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=hb.doom_and_destiny_advanced

iTUNES:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/doom-destiny-advanced/id967383325?mt=8

WINDOWS PHONE:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/games/doom-destiny-advanced/9nblggh1jw62

WINDOWS STORE:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/games/doom-and-destiny-advanced/9nblggh1jw60

AMAZON APP:
http://www.amazon.com/HeartBit-Interactive-Doom-Destiny-Advanced/dp/B010R0E1K2/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1438612980&sr=8-1&keywords=doom+%26+destiny+advanced

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DoomAndDestiny/
Official Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/groups/DoDeAdv/
